sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Protesters clash with police in Paris as hundreds of people rally, calling for justice after a gunman opened fire in a mainly Kurdish neighborhood.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The eastern Ukrainian city of Bakhmut has been left in ruins after a bombardment of Russian rockets.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Travelers in the UK and France scramble to make it home for Christmas as strikes continue to disrupt the transport industry.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Taliban security forces use water cannons to disperse women protesting a new ban on university education for female students.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: More clashes have broken out in Paris, as hundreds of people rally, calling for justice after a shooting in a mainly Kurdish neighborhood.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Three people were killed and many more injured on Friday when a gunman opened fire at a Kurdish cultural center and nearby cafe. From the moment this happens on French territory, this woman says, with a known person who has a criminal record and has been out of prison for 10 days, how can this person be armed with so much ammunition while walking around Paris and only attack Kurds?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Yesterday's shooting has stunned Paris' 10th district, Yesterday's shooting has stunned Paris' 10th district, a community preparing to commemorate the unresolved murder of three activists 10 years ago.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Police have arrested a 69-year-old man who authorities say had recently been freed from detention as he awaits trial for attacking a migrant camp.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The east Ukrainian city of Bakhmut has been left in ruins after a bombardment of Russian

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: rockets.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: As firefighters responded to calls of an artillery strike Friday night, another rocket ripped open the sky, landing less than a meter from the station.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: This is all that remains in the city.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Those who have survived have no electricity or running water.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: I make tea, porridge. This is our food, this resident says.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: There is no wood to light a fire.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: He goes to those ruins to collect firewood.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: I collect firewood, he says.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Books, firewood, it's all thrown out when there's an explosion.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: In Kharkiv, four soldiers are buried as loved ones and residents gather to pay their respects and honor their heroes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: There will be no Christmas celebrations for these families this year or much of their country as the war rages on and creeps closer to the one-year mark.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Some of these people at Marseille train station won't be home for Christmas, after France's national rail operator announced major service cancellations due to a strike.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Trade unions have now agreed to lift further strike action for the New Year's Eve weekend, but for some travellers, it's too late.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: In fact, I'm torn, this traveler says. I understand the fight of SNCF employees.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: I also understand those who are at the end of their tether, because you want to join your family and you just can't.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: In England, rail passengers have been rushing to catch the latest trains, as Christmas Eve services end due to further strikes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Most rail services finished late Saturday afternoon before RMT union staff begin industrial action in the evening.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: People heading home for the festive period have been hit with delays or cancellations throughout the day.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Postal workers and border force staff are also walking off the job.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: These Afghan women protesting their ban from universities and higher education have been dispersed by water cannons. This footage from social media shows the women taking cover in the city of Herat.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The country's rulers have faced widespread backlash this week after ordering women to stop attending universities immediately.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Just across the border in Quetta, Pakistan, men and women joined the protests.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: You cannot see any nation in the world that has gotten or achieved some milestones without education.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: So banning girls from education or not allowing them to get education is a miserable decision.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The Taliban has already banned girls from middle school and high school.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Teachers at this public school in western Kabul fear what this means for girls who are allowed to attend school until the sixth grade.
